function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficult decisions under uncertainty and time constraints","Impact":"Ineffective response to crisis, leading to further spread of disease","Mitigation":"Establish clear decision-making processes, training for crisis management, and scenario planning","Technologies":"Decision support systems, predictive analytics, and risk assessment tools","People":"Government officials, crisis management teams","Owner":"Government, crisis management teams"},{"Description":"Unclear health messaging","Impact":"Confusion and misinformation among the public, leading to non-compliance with health measures","Mitigation":"Develop clear, simple, and culturally appropriate health messaging, use multiple communication channels, and provide regular updates to the public","Technologies":"Communication platforms, public health information systems","People":"General public, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Health authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of community acceptance of self-quarantine measures","Impact":"Increased transmission of disease within communities, heightened risk of outbreak escalation","Mitigation":"Educate the public about the importance of self-quarantine, provide support for individuals in quarantine, and implement community engagement strategies","Technologies":"Remote monitoring technologies, telehealth platforms","People":"General public, individuals in self-quarantine","Owner":"Public health agencies, community organizations"}]}
